page.title: 03TRANSPORT:SCHOOL AND FARM
page.content: {MR MARTYN'S BUSES Mr Martyn has two buses.The one he uses in the morning has 12 seats and it has a C.B. and a radio. The afternoon one is similar but the seats are arranged differently. The vans are not the full size of a Transit twin wheel but are small{Sherpas.}The vans are both diesel. Mr Martyn uses his buses to collect and deliver children to and from school safely. The{Milk lorry}can not go faster than 40 m.p.h.It is 6 tons when empty, but when it is full it weighs 16 tons .It is 19 feet or so long.It holds 2000 gallons. {Tractors}are a very valuable piece of machinery.They are versatile and are used for many jobs.Farmers may have a number of tractors each being suited for heavy or light work.
